p: Quantification of IFN-α, IFN-β, IFN-λ1, TNF-α, IL-6, IL-1β, and IP-10 secreted by human DCs after 12 h and by NHBE cells after 48 h of infection with different NS1-expressing recombinant viruses was performed with a multiplex ELISA kit (ProcartaPlex Assay; Invitrogen) according to the manufacturer’s recommendations. Data were analyzed by xPONENT software for the Luminex MAGPIx System.
